job.title: Software Engineer for Construction Robotics â€“ full stack
job.description: pstrongCome help us change the way we build our worldstrongppbrppstrongIf you are a software engineer curious about the physical world around you and interested in impacting one of the worlds largest industries with the digital tools you build then Toggle may be the place for youstrongppbrppWe are a construction robotics company building software and automation solutions for the worlds most ubiquitous building material reinforced concrete Our initial focus is on bringing automation systems to the fabrication and assembly of rebar steel reinforcement Rebar and reinforced concrete are the fundamental building blocks for cities and infrastructure They are materials youll find on 100 of construction sites whether for housing hospitals bridges or power plants As our world becomes increasingly urbanized both at home and abroad and we transition to renewable energy the way we work with this critical building material needs to evolve to meet growing and increasingly complex construction demandppbrppAs a member of the software team you will work closely with our Director of Software Engineering robotics and software engineers to help architect and build the software platform that will power our factory and robotic systems This is a unique opportunity to contribute to the development of new technology for the construction industry in the early stage Series A of an advanced manufacturing and robotics company We are building a complete software workflow and physical manufacturing system to transform one of the most difficult materials in construction into a digitally fabricated productppbrppstrongWhat Youll DostrongpulliArchitect design and develop internal and customer facing software tools that directly drive our businessliliHelp curate the software technology decisions for a business that will heavily rely on software to scale operate and growliliBuild the software systems that supportliliIntake and processing of architectural and engineering planslili2D and 3D modeling of rebar assembliesliliRobotic motion planning and industrial machinery interfacingliliCommerce and logisticsliliUIUX for all of these systemsliliIntegrate with thirdparty APIs and cloudbased servicesliulpbrppstrongAbout Youstrongpulli35 years of professional software development experience preferredliliSolid Computer Science and system design fundamentalsliliExperience architecting writing and maintaining web applicationsliliYou thrive on being involved in all aspects of a feature development backend and frontendliliYoure fluent with modern web development technologies and have a good feel for the strengths and weaknesses of different toolsliliYou value the craft of software engineering while pragmatic and efficient when it comes to shipping featuresliliA proven record of development and ownership through the full product life cycleliliA product centric approach that prioritizes our customers experience in the design and development processliliA creative collaborative and open minded team player with strong listening and communications skillsliliA bias toward simplicity and reliability in everything you buildliulpbrppstrongNice to HavesstrongpulliExperience with GoliliExperience with relational databases optimizations tradeoffs design patternsliliExperience with TypescriptliliExperience with React or other frontend UI frameworksliliExperience with WebGLliliExperience with git or other version control system and CICD pipelinesliliExperience with robotics manufacturing enterprise commerce or logisticsliulpbrppstrongCurrent Technology stackstrongpulliBackend Go Postgres Redis Docker JSONRPCliliFrontend React amp TypeScript TailwindCSS SnowpackWebpackliulpbrppstrongToggle is a multidisciplinary company and we value diverse talent and perspectivesstrongppbrppWe believe our advantage comes from both the depth and breadth of experience and backgrounds of our team We bring together industry veterans and outsiders technicians and designers and software with hardware trade craft and business If you can add a new skill set discipline background or perspective to our team we are excited to hear from youppbrppemWe are an equalopportunity employer and dont discriminate based on gender race ethnicity orientation creed or other trait We support and encourage candidates of all backgrounds to applyemp
